entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Shoal Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:17 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shoal Lake 10:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -25.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -30.2°C
Wind: NNE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 22 February 2023
